title: Joy Division - Substance (2015) [24-96 HD FLAC]
description:
Substance is a singles compilation album by the post-punk band Joy Division, originally released on Factory Records in 1988. The 2015 HDtracks release includes the 2010 remasters. The singles are taken from four EPs: An Ideal for Living, A Factory Sample, Earcom 2: Contradiction and Licht und Blindheit. The record also includes a few singles that were previously unreleased on albums by the group.

Joy Division - Substance
Label: Rhino
Format: WEB, 19 files FLAC, Compilation, Reissue, Remastered, 24bit 96kHz HDtracks
Released: 2015
Originally released 1988
Genre: Rock, Post Punk
